    <div class="container links text-right">
        <a href="/profile">{{ user.name }}</a>
        <a href="/logout">LogOut</a>
    </div>
{% else %}
        <div class="container links text-right">
            <a href="login">LogIn</a>
            <a href="register">SignUp</a>    
        </div>
{% endif %}
